item.description:
1st Annual Steel Rail Half Marathon. It will be a flat, fast and beautiful tour of Northern Berkshire County on the Ashuwillticook Rail Trail, point to point from Pittsfield to Adams. Should be very barefoot friendly, where I usually run barefoot. Will also be followed by an after party sponsored by BBC. FREE BEER! Buses will be provided to return runners from Adams to Pittsfield.

Registration is open! @ https://eorcrunner1.wufoo.com/forms/steel-rail-half-marathon/ or mail in form available at Berkshiruerunningcenter.com along with more information. Info also availableÂ on facebook @ "Steel Rail Half Marathon" or "Berkshire Running Center".

They are also looking for 50 Volunteers to make it all possible. Free T-Shirt (and BEER!)
item.name: Steel Rail Half Marathon
